reviews.review_msg: Though the material taught wasn't as i thought i would be, but it was still a fun and interesting course. John really encouraged discussions and was quite helpful as long as you kept asking questions, and he answered them with the best of his knowledge.

Very strange course. I had no idea what I was supposed to be learning. I pretty much BS'd my way through the final writing about how much I liked my town and ended up with a C+. I learned nothing except that hippies are a tad bit annoying.

I have no idea what I was supposed to have learned in this class. It was very random, and very disorgranized. The marking was fair, and the exams were easy. However, I was looking forward to taking this class as my breadth course, and came away extremely disappointed. He can't teach.
